alert.note: Alert for South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 2:52PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Albany and southwestern Laramie Counties through 330 PM MDT... At 251 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pumpkin Vine, or 22 miles southeast of Laramie, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pumpkin Vine. This includes Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 340 and 347. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
